name: quantifiably
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that can be measured: The figures show that what we've been saying all these years is quantifiably true. Sometimes you can say with reasonable confidence that a particular advertising campaign is quantifiably better at generating sales than another. Related word
quantifiable
More examplesFewer examplesNothing has ever shown quantifiably that the protest influenced elections.More quantifiably, there's been a significant improvement in productivity and activity.Injuries are quantifiably predictable and can arguably be considered among the costs of doing business.
